property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Crown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stark unique character only. Attached character gets +2 STR and is immune to opponent's events and character abilities. If the Black Raven card is not in play, it is Winter.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stark character only. Any Phase: Kneel Grey Wind to choose and kill 1 character with STR 1 or lower. (STR 2 or lower if attached character is Robb Stark.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stark character only. After you win a challenge in which attached character participated, stand Shaggydog. Challenges: Kneel a Direwolf card to choose 1 attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-limited location or attachment. Treat attached card as though its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Reed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Jojen Reed and kneel 1 influence to name a card. Then, discard the top 3 cards of a player's deck. For each copy of the named card discarded, Jojen Reed claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Eddard Stark is defending, lower the attacking player's claim to 0.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Put Catelyn Stark into play from your hand, knelt as a defender during an Intrigue or Power challenge initiated against you. At the end of the phase, if Catelyn Stark is still in play, return her to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Name a Trait. Until the end of the phase, each character you control that has that Trait gets +1 STR (+2 STR instead if it is Winter). Limit once per round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control Bran Stark, he gains: "cannot be chosen as the target of an opponent's event card." If Bran Stark is in play, lower the cost to play Summer by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you lose an Intrigue challenge, kill Bran Stark (cannot be saved). Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge as the defender, Bran Stark claims 5 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. No attachments except Direwolf.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Glover. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Deepwood Mercenary is declared as an attacker or defender, choose and discard 1 attachment from any other participating character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Septon. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Tully Septon cannot attack, and does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Mormont.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Host of the Bear from play at any time your total initiative is 2 or lower.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the marshalling phase, you may pay any amount of King Robb's Companions' cost by kneeling that amount of influence.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Knight of the Red Fork from your hand, kneel all non-House Tully cards you control. Knight of the Red Fork does not stand during the standing phase if you lost dominance this round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Guard at Riverrun gets +1 STR while defending. At the end of the challenge phase, if no opponent has won a Military challenge against you this round, draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Edmure's Host by 1 for each House Tully character you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a House Tully character you control is declared as a defender, remove all attacking characters with STR 1 or lower from the challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Tully characters get +1 STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Blackfish has 3 or more power, your House Tully characters do not kneel to attack. Response: After you win a Military challenge as the attacker, draw 1 card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, claim 1 power for your House. (2 power instead if it was a Military challenge.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Westeros. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the challenge phase, if you have not lost a challenge this round, each House Tully character you control claims 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Mole Town Brothel from play any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose and stand 1 defending character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Winterfell. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Frozen Outpost to choose and stand 1 defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR (+4 STR instead if it is a War character).

property.name: Text
property.value: Direwolf characters you control gain stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Lord Eddard's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Godswood to lower the cost of the next Stark character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Winterfell. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Northern Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next Stark card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Narrow Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next Stark or Baratheon character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge as the defender, choose and kill 1 attacking character (cannot be saved).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Save a location from being discarded. Then, attach They Shall Not Cross to a Stark character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR.")

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Search your deck for 1 Direwolf card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the effects of an event card just played if one of your Stark characters is chosen as the only target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose 1 of your participating Stark characters to get +2 STR until the end of the challenge. Response: After you win a Military challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Endless Endurance from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Stand all Creature cards in play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kill 1 non-unique character with printed STR 3 or less controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wildling. Army.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise the Claim value on the attacking player's revealed plot card by 1 during the first challenge declared each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot trigger its abilities and cannot kneel to pay for effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Army characters do not kneel to attack during Military challenges.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Marshalling: Kneel Street of Steel to lower the cost of the next character with a Military icon you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose 1 character or 1 location. Until the end of the phase, treat the printed text box of that character or location as though it were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Military challenge in which you have at least 1 participating War character, choose and kill 1 character controlled by the losing opponent. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore the out of House gold penalty on all Stark cards. Each opponent without a Treaty agenda needs 5 fewer power (to a minimum of 10) to win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot claim power for your House except during a Military challenge. Response: After you win a Military challenge, claim 2 power for your House.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses and discards 1 of his or her characters from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all characters in play as though their printed text boxes were blank (except for Traits). Limit 1 per plot deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations are immune to events this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you lose initiative, discard your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may initiate an additional Military challenge during the challenge phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of House Tully cards, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Then, shuffle the other searched cards back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost of the first Stark character you play during the marshalling phase by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.
